content.rendered:
Personal Checking

Personal Checking

At Westamerica, you can choose from a wide variety of checking accounts to suit your financial needs. Our account selection ranges from basic banking services to packaged, interest-bearing accounts.

  • Value
  • Interest
  • Signature
  • Premier Plus

Value Checking

  • Enjoy basic banking services with online banking.
  • $4.00 monthly service charge.1
  • A minimum of five (5) Personal ATM/Debit Card purchase transactions per statement cycle; otherwise, $4.00.1
  • Enrollment in eStatements; otherwise, $4.00.1
  • Establish direct deposit; otherwise, $4.00.1
  • No monthly service charge with qualifying balances.
  • Free StarConnect Plus™ online banking with unlimited bill pay.
  • No monthly fee for POS purchases. 
  • ATM/Debit card with an unlimited number of purchases and ATM withdrawals.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Personal Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Interest Checking

  • Enjoy a full service account which earns interest.
  • $14.00 monthly service charge.1
  • Enrollment in eStatements; otherwise, $4.00.1
  • No monthly service charge with qualifying balances.
  • Free StarConnect Plus online banking with unlimited bill pay.
  • Earns interest on daily collected balances of $1,000 or more.
  • ATM/Debit card with an unlimited number of signature-based purchases and ATM withdrawals.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Personal Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Signature Account

  • Enjoy a premium account with exclusive savings and preferred services.
  • ​$20.00 monthly service charge.1
  • Enrollment in eStatements; otherwise, $4.00.1
  • No monthly service charge with qualifying balances.
  • Earns interest on daily collected balance of $1,000 or more.
  • Free StarConnect Plus online banking with unlimited Bill Pay.
  • Signature Protection Identity Theft and Fraud Prevention.
  • Free personal size safe deposit box (or a discount on a larger box).
  • No annual fee for Extra Cash Overdraft Protection, subject to credit approval.
  • Up to three (3) free cashier’s checks per month. 
  • Free standard Westamerica checks.
  • No charge for withdrawals from any non-Westamerica ATM if balance requirements are met.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Personal Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Premier Plus

  • An account for those aged 50 or better with valuable membership benefits and services.
  • No monthly service charge. $8.00 Membership Fee.1
  • Enrollment in eStatements; otherwise, $4.00.1
  • Earns interest on daily collected balances of $1,000 or more.
  • Free StarConnect Plus online banking with unlimited bill pay.
  • Payment Card Protection for all your credit, debit and ATM cards in the event of loss or theft.
  • $10,000 Accidental Death and $150,000 Common Carrier Insurance.
  • Free personal size safe deposit box or a $45.00 discount on a larger box for one year.
  • Free standard Westamerica checks.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Personal Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.
